profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday April 30, 2019 at 06:30

did.unittitle: Alexander Petrunkevitch Archives

repository.corpname: Yale Peabody Museum of Natural History

did.abstract: The archives of Alexander Petrunkevitch, accumulated during his time at Yale.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Alexander Petrunkevitch Archives, Entomology, Yale Peabody Museum

bioghist.head: Biographical Sketch
bioghist.p: Born in Russia, moved to germany for PhD (1900). Became professor of Zooloogy at Yale. Made man contributions to the field of Arachnids.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Material
scopecontent.p: The Archives of Alexander Petrunkevitch include correspondence, manuscript and biographical materials as well as Yale lecture materials.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Original Manuscripts, materials and supporting documants from Alexander Petrunkevitch.

did.unittitle: Data & Supporting Documents. Data and documents supporting Alexander Petrunkevitch's manuscripts. 3 boxes.
Original Manuscripts. Collection of Alexander Petrunkevitch's original manuscripts. 4 boxes.
Biographical Materials
Biographical Information. Various biographical paper work including Death certification, life timeline, Obituaries etc.
Biographical Memoirs. Memours written by Charles Timberlake and G.E. Hutchinson.
Census. Copy of the cencus filled out by A. Petrunkevitch.
Curriculm Vitae.
Honors. Honors and awards recieved bu A. Petrunkevitch.
Retirement. Various resources used for planing the suprise party and manuscript in the honor of Alexander Petrunkevitch's retirement.
Yale Teaching Materials

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Materials used for leactures and labs during A. Petrunkevitch's time as a professor of Zoology at Yale University.

did.unittitle: Arachnida Keys. EST number of items= 10+.
Histology.
Lectures & Essays. Class and public lectures as well as essays by Alexander Petrunkevitch.
